commentText: I like this coffee it's really smooth and has an after taste of chocolate. Service was brilliant and the coffee was delivered the day after I ordered it and was ground perfectly for the Cafetiere.
This is one of our favourites and the love of coffee delivered it in time for my Saturday am coffee.

I recently purchased Kopi Luwak as a gift for my Father, he had been wanting to try it for a long time and was so excited when he opened it. You could smell the coffee through the wrapping paper and when he tried it, he loved it. I will definitely be recommending this coffee to others and recommend they purchase from your website as the delivery and service was brilliant. Many thanks.
I have always ordered this flavour from my previous coffee supplier, it's just as good now from the love of coffee.
I ordered this coffee for special occasions, but we ended up having it almost every day. It is smooth and aromatic, going to order again!.
This coffee has a bit of sweetness without compromising the taste. good for afternoon when you want something sweeter.

Brought some Kopi Luwak to enjoy on Christmas day. Didn't order until late but even with the standard postage the coffee arrived in time great service. The coffee went down a treat and I'm just about to order some more thank you the love of coffee.
This coffee is expensive but worth the treat! I bought it for a friend and they are very pleased that I did!.
Perfect coffee for after dinner, for those times when you want something a little special. Will most definetely be ordering more. Thanks for a great service 'the Love of Coffee'.
I found the Indian Monsoon Malabar very smooth and easy to drink. I look forward to trying out other coffees in the range. Delivery service is excellent.
